overview:
Bill Varga leads the development of Quova’s strategic relationships and partner program. He has held executive roles in global marketing and sales with top 100 software companies. Most recently he was Vice President at Interact Commerce helping to grow CRM sales from start up to $100m in three years. Prior to that he was Vice President at ERP developer Infinium Software (formerly Software2000) where he helped lead the companyâ€™s transformation into an open platform competitor.

He has been actively engaged in several technology startup ventures, as an advisory board member, consultant and executive. Varga holds an MBA in marketing from the University of Bridgeport and a Bachelor of Science degree from Central Connecticut State University.
